评论详情: Fit true to size, very flattering. I wore it to my 50th high school reunion & received many compliments. The only reason I am giving it a 4star rating instead of 5 was that it wrinkled in my suitcase. I steamed them out, but I prefer things that don’t wrinkle coz I travel a lot.
I bought this in black. It fits and hangs well and I love the sheer sleeves. The quality is very nice. I am going to buy another one in a different color.
Nothing wrong with quality. It just seemed like such an old women's shirt when I put it on like something Mrs. Roper would have worn on the old sitcom "3s Company"😂

This blouse looks pretty until you get the item and can actually see it.  I do not like the material.  It's very porous and not in a good way.

The trim on the neckline also makes it look like it is the neck on a t-shirt.  The fabric is super cheap. Also in the photo the shirt is nipped in at the waist.  This shirt has a straight fall, it actually flairs out from the shoulders.  Had I looked at the photos of people with 4 and 5 star reviews I would have understood the fit.  It is not flattering on most even though the people think it is.  On apple and pear shaped bodies it blobs out from the shoulders and people find that flattering because you can't see their middle.  I am not going to return it because that is too much trouble.  By tucking the underlayer in a pair of high waisted jeans I can get more shape back and salvage this, but I am going to wear it more like a t-shirt.  Definitely not dressy or formal.
